channel.title: Join on Rowan Amateur Radio Society
channel.description: Recent content in Join on Rowan Amateur Radio Society

item.title: Join Us
item.description:
Join Us

Thinking about getting into amateur radio? Already licensed and looking for a local crew? The Rowan Amateur Radio Society (RARS) is a great place to plug in. We’re a relaxed, friendly group that enjoys learning, experimenting, and helping each other out – on the air and in person.

Why Join RARS

You’ll Find a Community. Ham radio is more fun with people around you. At RARS, you’ll meet operators of all experience levels who are happy to share ideas, answer questions, and swap stories.

item.title: Membership Application
item.description:
Join RARS

Thank you for your interest in joining the Rowan Amateur Radio Society! Whether you’re a newly licensed ham or an experienced operator, we welcome you to our club.

Membership is open to all - you don’t need to be licensed to join, but active participation in club activities is encouraged.

You can apply online using the form below, or download the membership application (PDF) and bring it with you to the next meeting.
